description: Delicious apple and cinnamon pancakes, that don't stick to the fry pan while cooking
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Apple & Cinnamon Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl sift flour, bicarbonate soda, baking powder, icing sugar, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt
In another bowl mix together oil, vinegar, vanilla essence, egg and apple sauce
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients lightly fold in together, add a little milk if it's too thick, don't over mix, let stand for 15 minutes
Ready to cook, I use a pancake maker, but can be cooked in a fry pan.
